TEI.2.document_title: William Stafford to Stephen F. Austin, 09-16-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 896

div1.p: Dear Sir I arived home and rented out My plantation My cotton picked Holed to the Jin and will be out in a Short time, Mr Chart Wright will be on with Me and wants you to do all you Can for him I do Expect that he Will want a Labor Sir I am yours
